summary: In Vinegaroon, Texas, former outlaw Roy Bean appoints himself the judge for the region and dispenses his brand of justice as he sees fit.
cast: Paul Newman|Roy Jenson|Gary Combs|Fred Brookfield|Bennie E. Dobbins|Richard Farnsworth|Leroy Johnson|Fred Krone|Terry Leonard|Dean Smith|Margo Epper|Jeannie Epper|Stephanie Epper|Victoria Principal|Barbara J. Longo|Anthony Perkins|Frank Soto|Ned Beatty|Jim Burk|Matt Clark|Bill McKinney|Steve Kanaly|Francesca Jarvis|Karen Carr|Lee Meza|Dolores Clark|Tab Hunter|Neil Summers|Jack Colvin|John Huston|Bruno The Bear|Howard Morton|Stacy Keach|Billy Pearson|Roddy McDowall|Stan Barrett|Dean Casper|Don Starr|Alfred G. Bosnos|Anthony Zerbe|John Hudkins|David Sharpe|Jacqueline Bisset|Ava Gardner|Ken Freehill|Mark Headley|Duncan Inches|Rusty Lee
title: El juez de la horca
